metadata.title: VidFab - AI Video Platform
metadata.description: Transform your videos with cutting-edge AI technology. Create, enhance, and convert videos effortlessly with VidFab.

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to start creating amazing AI-powered videos
auth.signUpDescription: Join thousands of creators using AI to transform their videos
auth.verifyingCode: Please wait while we verify your code

video.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your video here

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for you and start creating amazing AI videos.

basic.name: Basic
basic.description: Perfect for individuals just getting started with AI video creation.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Ideal for content creators who need comprehensive video capabilities.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For organizations that need the most powerful video capabilities.

features.title: Powerful AI Video Features
features.description: Everything you need to create, enhance, and transform your videos with AI.

aiGeneration.title: AI Video Generation
aiGeneration.description: Create stunning videos from text prompts using advanced AI models.

videoEnhancement.title: Video Enhancement
videoEnhancement.description: Improve video quality, resolution, and visual appeal automatically.

formatConversion.title: Format Conversion
formatConversion.description: Convert between any video formats with optimized settings.

batchProcessing.title: Batch Processing
batchProcessing.description: Process multiple videos simultaneously to save time.

customModels.title: Custom Models
customModels.description: Train custom AI models for your specific video creation needs.

apiAccess.title: API Access
apiAccess.description: Integrate VidFab's capabilities directly into your applications.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.validationError: Please check your input and try again.
errors.insufficientCredits: Insufficient credits. Please upgrade your plan.
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {maxSize}.
errors.processingFailed: Video processing failed. Please try again.
